detail_desc: Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with overlocked frill trims at the front and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets, flap leg pockets and narrow hems.
Leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
Hair clips in metal and plastic. Width 0.5 cm, length 6 cm.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Polyester filling. Lined.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a deep neckline at the front and a chest pocket.
Kaftan in an airy weave with buttons down the front and high slits in the sides.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lined cups, removable inserts and an elasticated hem. Racer back with an opening and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Extra firm support.

Fully lined balconette bikini top with moulded, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that can be detached or fastened in various ways, a concealed silicone trim and a metal fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a sequin motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Corset in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and suspenders. Fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Joggers in soft, washed denim in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket. The joggers are made partly from recycled polyester and cotton.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.

Knee-length Bermuda shorts in woven fabric with a regular waist and zip fly with a concealed button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with creases. The polyester content of the shorts is recycled.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short, A-line skirt in a jacquard weave with a concealed zip.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the top. Press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1-4Y) and narrow ribbing at the hems.
Sandals in imitation leather with appliqués. Adjustable foot and ankle straps with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.

Flared skirt in washed, slightly stretchy cotton twill with buttons at the top and decorative buttons at the hem. Adjustable, elasticated waist with covered, gathered elastication at the back, and pockets in the side seams.
5-pocket, slim-fit, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Vest top in soft jersey made partly from organic cotton.
Shirt in an airy cotton and linen weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and loops at the top. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles with a low heel.

Short-sleeved shirt in a stretch cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke and darts at the back and a rounded hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders, gently tapered sleeves and an accentuated waist to create a flattering silhouette.
T-shirt in patterned cotton jersey.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Deep V-neck with ties, buttons down the front, short puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with a slight sheen. Layered at the top with a wide flounce that covers one shoulder. Gathered seam at one side for a draped effect and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the other side. Jersey lining.
Jumpsuit in soft, patterned jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a small V-neck with a tie detail at the front. Elasticated seam under the tummy.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Double, adjustable spaghetti straps, wide elastic at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short, sleeveless A-line dress in soft viscose jersey.
Thin metal-chain necklace with a decorative ring and leaf-shaped pendant. Length 45.5-51.5 cm.
Nursing dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and wrapover top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Elasticated seam at the waist with a tie. Unlined.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, covered heels and a concealed zip in one side. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.

Pyjamas in soft velour with an appliqué on the front. Top with a round neck, press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.

Lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a pile-lined drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed side pockets. Quilted lining.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Fitted, one-shoulder top in velour with shimmering spots. One long sleeve.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft jersey with long sleeves.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved blouse in a semi-transparent, burn-out patterned weave with a pleated round collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck, short puff sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Plastic Alice bands with ears on top.
Dress in an airy viscose weave with an opening and pearly button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication, and a skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.

prod_name: Jade Trash HW Skinny Denim TRS
detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jumper in textured-knit cotton with a slightly wider neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jacket in a woven cotton blend with a stand-up collar with a decorative zip, and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Flap chest and patch pockets with a button, a concealed drawstring at the waist and a button at the cuffs. Lined.
Short dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Short cap sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and hem.
Fully lined, smocked bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Sleeveless top in satin with a lace section at the top and a V-neck front and back.
Crop tops in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and narrow elastication at the hem.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print and sequins. Narrow trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short halterneck dress in chiffon with a shimmering pattern. Opening at the front, a hook-and-eye fastening and ties at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in a linen and viscose weave with a sweetheart neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems.
Long-sleeved piqué top in fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Platform sandals in imitation leather. Adjustable straps with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and chunky soles. Platform 4 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in cotton jersey with a textured stripe. Horizontal opening with ties at the front and short sleeves. Unlined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Swimsuit with a deep V-neck, lined cups with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Ribbed collar, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline, drawstring down the front and a smocked back. Elastication over the shoulders and short, elasticated puff sleeves. Unlined.
Earrings made of round metal rings. Length 7 cm, diameter of larger ring approx 4.5 cm.
Short-sleeved, straight-cut tunic in light sweatshirt fabric with cotton poplin flounces.
Hat in braided paper straw with a wide grosgrain band.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Dress in a textured cotton and viscose weave with a flounce around the neckline and one shoulder and a narrow strap with a decorative tie detail on the other shoulder. Gathered seam and a wide flounce at the hem.
Double-breasted coat in felted fabric with a collar and decorative stitching front and back. Decorative flaps at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.
